title: A generous offer
author: VD
content_html:
A regular who wishes to remain nameless would like to buy a copy of Summa Elvetica for those who would like a copy but feel they cannot afford one for whatever reason. He’s willing to buy 10 of them, so if you’d like to receive a free book, please let me know and email me the address to which you’d like it sent from Amazon. No strings, no nonsense.

We’ll do this as part of the Summa surge, which I’ll announce once the OC tells me when and how we should do it.

UPDATE – We have our ten takers now. I’ll be emailing them tomorrow to let them know.
